entry.title: https://github.com/impermeable/coq-waterproof
entry.content: The Waterproof plugin for the Coq proof assistant allows you to write Coq proofs in a style that resembles handwritten mathematical proofs, designed to help university students with learning how to prove mathematical statements.

entry.title: https://github.com/mit-plv/coqutil
entry.content: Coq library for tactics, basic definitions, sets, maps

entry.title: https://github.com/tchajed/coq-record-update
entry.content: Library to create Coq record update functions
